name: KHQLocalNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: KHQ is the top-rated news source in the Inland Northwest, covering breaking news and developing weather conditions in your neighborhood. We are first to cover the news and last to leave the scene, bringing you the most complete information on the events that matter the most in your community.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
